text.speaker: SMOKING WOMAN
text.text: You talk to him? Did he tell you, why he's sweating?

text.speaker: LUCY
text.text: Sure. Here take this. I'm Lucy by the way.

text.speaker: player
text.text: He just said it's hot in here. That's all.

text.speaker: SMOKING WOMAN
text.text: Well maybe he need's a drink and then he'll talk?
